action.primary: Nourishes Yin, eliminates Heat, calms cough, stops bleeding

indications: Cough, asthma, night sweat, hemoptysis, night blindness, consumptive disease, hectic fever due to Yin Deficiency, hemorrhoidal bleeding, general debility, bone steaming fever, tidal fever and nyctalopia

contraindications: This substance is no longer used.
